item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。股票期货在反弹后涨跌不一，中东紧张局势令原油岌岌可危，而国债又恢复了以往的角色。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. Stock futures are mixed after a rally, Middle East tension is rattling crude and Treasuries have reverted to their former role. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 美国再融资启动，全球债券反弹面临供应考验
item.description: 本周二，美国财政部将开始出售总额达 1,250 亿美元的债券，美国降息希望点燃的全球债券涨势将面临首次重大考验。【原文：The global bond rally ignited by hopes of lower interest rates in the US will face its first big test on Tuesday, with the Treasury starting sales that will total $125 billion this week.】

item.title: 与债券持有人达成债务协议后，S&P 将阿德勒降级两级
item.description: 在陷入困境的阿德勒集团与债券持有人就其债务重组签署非约束性协议后，S&P 全球评级公司将阿德勒集团的评级从 "CCC+"下调至 "CCC-"。【原文：S&P Global Ratings has downgraded Adler Group to ‘CCC-’ from ‘CCC+’ after the embattled landlord signed a non-binding agreement with bondholders on restructuring its debt.】

item.title: 瑞典央行对可能的降息疑虑重重：决策指南
item.description: 瑞典央行本周要么削减借贷成本以援助经济，要么回避这一举措以避免削弱克朗，这将是瑞典央行多年来最具悬念的决定之一。【原文：The Riksbank will either cut borrowing costs this week to aid the economy or else shirk from a move to avoid weakening the krona, in one of its most suspenseful decisions in years.】

item.title: 欧盟旨在打击 11 艘参与破坏制裁的俄罗斯船只
item.description: 欧盟提议限制 11 艘有助于俄罗斯维持对乌克兰战争能力的船只。【原文：The European Union has proposed restrictions on 11 vessels that contribute to Russia’s ability to sustain its war against Ukraine.】

item.title: 台湾通胀率降至关键阈值以下，缓解了对利率的担忧
item.description: 台湾上个月的通胀率低于央行规定的 2% 临界值，减轻了央行在 6 月份下次会议上再次提高借贷成本的压力。【原文：Taiwan’s inflation rate fell below the central bank’s 2% threshold last month, easing pressure on the central bank to raise borrowing costs again at its next meeting in June.】

item.title: 英国央行因技术问题推迟长期回购操作
item.description: 英格兰银行推迟了每周一次的回购操作，因为其拍卖平台遇到了技术故障。【原文：The Bank of England postponed one of its weekly repo operations because its auction platform is experiencing technical difficulties.】

item.title: 裕信银行市值突破 600 亿欧元，跻身精英俱乐部
item.description: 本周二，意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）的市值超过 600 亿欧元（646 亿美元），成为欧元区四家超过这一门槛的银行之一。【原文：UniCredit SpA’s market capitalization rose above €60 billion ($64.6 billion) on Tuesday, making it one of four euro area banks to exceed that threshold.】

item.title: 瑞银在瑞士改革前就已增资 200 亿美元
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）首席执行官塞尔吉奥-埃尔莫蒂（Sergio Ermotti）表示，尽管瑞士政府计划从明年起提高监管要求，但瑞银集团在整合瑞士信贷业务的过程中，已经为其监管储备增加了近 200 亿美元的资本。【原文：UBS Group AG is already adding almost $20 billion in capital to its regulatory reserves as it integrates Credit Suisse’s business, Chief Executive Officer Sergio Ermotti said, regardless of the Swiss government’s plans to increase requirements from next year.】

item.title: 中国连续第 18 个月掀起黄金购买热潮
item.description: 中国央行 4 月份连续第 18 个月扩大黄金储备，延续了帮助推动贵金属创下历史新高的购买热潮。【原文：China’s central bank expanded its gold reserves for an 18th straight month in April, extending a buying spree that helped drive the precious metal to a record high.】

item.title: 德科斯称，若通胀路径保持不变，欧洲央行可在 6 月降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员巴勃罗-埃尔南德斯-德-科斯（Pablo Hernandez de Cos）表示，如果消费者价格不再受到冲击，欧洲中央银行可以在下个月的会议上开始降低利率。【原文：The European Central Bank can begin to lower interest rates at its meeting next month, should there be no more jolts to consumer prices, according to Governing Council member Pablo Hernandez de Cos.】

item.title: 南非工会敦促英格集团股东拒绝必和必拓的收购要约
item.description: 南非最大的工会联合会敦促包括强大的公共投资公司在内的当地股东反对必和必拓集团收购英美资源集团。【原文：South Africa’s biggest labor union federation urged local shareholders, including the powerful Public Investment Corp., to oppose BHP Group Ltd.’s bid to buy Anglo American Plc.】

item.title: 菲律宾希望今年首次发行 20 亿美元全球债券
item.description: 菲律宾财政部长拉尔夫-雷克托（Ralph Recto）表示，菲律宾希望在本周二分两部分出售美元债券，筹集多达 20 亿美元的资金，这是菲律宾今年首次进入国际市场。【原文：The Philippines is looking to raise as much as $2 billion from a two-part dollar bond sale on Tuesday, its first trip to the international market this year, according to Finance Secretary Ralph Recto.】

item.title: 大亨阿加瓦尔的印度锌业公司将支付 5.06 亿美元股息以减轻债务负担
item.description: 金属大亨阿尼尔-阿加瓦尔（Anil Agarwal）的印度斯坦锌业有限公司（Hindustan Zinc Ltd.）表示，该公司计划支付 422.5 亿卢比（约合 5.06 亿美元）的中期股息，这可能有助于母公司韦丹塔资源有限公司（Vedanta Resources Ltd.）的去杠杆化计划。【原文：Metal tycoon Anil Agarwal’s Hindustan Zinc Ltd. said it plans to pay 42.25 billion rupees ($506 million) in interim dividends, potentially aiding parent Vedanta Resources Ltd.’s deleveraging plans.】

item.title: 卢拉领导下的鸽派在巴西央行迅速掌权
item.description: 上任 17 个月以来，路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦总统在他整个任期内一直与之抗争的巴西中央银行打上了自己的印记。现在，该银行九名董事会成员中有四名是卢拉任命的。随着他们人数的增加和影响力的扩大，他们已经开始慢慢地改变这个近来一直积极地、近乎痴迷地与通货膨胀作斗争的机构的内部心态。【原文：Seventeen months into office, President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva has put his stamp on the Brazilian central bank he has battled throughout his term. Four of the bank’s nine board members are now Lula appointees. And as they’ve grown in number and influence, they’ve begun to slowly shift the mindset inside an institution that has lately been aggressive, and almost obsessed, with its fight against inflation.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行的 Orcel 称所有涉俄银行都收到了欧洲央行的信函
item.description: 在莱法森国际银行股份公司（Raiffeisen Bank International AG）上个月披露监管机构要求其进一步削减俄罗斯业务之后，意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）很可能是收到欧洲中央银行信函敦促其减少俄罗斯业务风险敞口的贷款机构之一。【原文：UniCredit SpA is likely among lenders that have received a letter by the European Central Bank urging them to reduce their exposure to Russia, after Raiffeisen Bank International AG last month revealed it was told by the regulator to further cut its Russian business.】

item.title: 日本央行上田表示将密切关注日元疲软对物价的影响
item.description: Kazuo Ueda 摄影师：Akio Kon/Bloomberg【原文：Kazuo Ueda Photographer: Akio Kon/Bloomberg】

item.title: 瑞银成为首家因降息而受到冲击的欧洲主要银行
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）表示，瑞士最近的降息将打击贷款收入，使其成为欧洲第一家发出警告的大型贷款机构，称近两年的升息终于变成了逆风。【原文：UBS Group AG said the recent interest rate cut in Switzerland will hit lending income, making it the first big lender in Europe to warn that an almost two-year boost has finally turned into a headwind.】

item.title: 泰国延长印度和台湾游客免签证计划
item.description: 泰国内阁批准了一项计划，将印度和台湾游客的免签证计划再延长六个月，因为这个东南亚国家正努力增加外国游客的数量，以支撑其疲软的经济。【原文：Thailand’s cabinet approved a plan to extend visa exemption programs for tourists from India and Taiwan for six more months, as the Southeast Asian nation seeks to boost the number of foreign arrivals to shore up its sluggish economy.】

item.title: 股票交易员担心莫迪获胜，印度恐慌指数飙升
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪的政党在正在举行的全国大选中赢得的席位可能少于最初的预期，这可能会影响该党实施政策改革的能力，这一猜测动摇了印度 4.6 万亿美元股票市场的相对平静期。【原文：A period of relative calm in India’s $4.6 trillion stock market has been shaken by speculation that Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s party may win fewer seats than initially expected in the ongoing national elections, which could affect its ability to carry out policy reforms.】

item.title: 澳大利亚威尔玛糖厂因薪酬问题面临工业行动
item.description: 一位工会官员说，澳大利亚的糖厂隶属于威玛国际有限公司，占该国糖厂产量的一半以上，从周四起，这些糖厂将因要求提高薪酬而面临工业行动。【原文：Sugar mills in Australia belonging to Wilmar International Ltd. and representing more than half of the country’s production face industrial action from Thursday over demands for higher pay, a union official said.】

item.title: 德国经理人认为全球经济上扬不会促进其业务发展
item.description: 据一项行业游说团体调查显示，在海外开展业务的德国公司两年来最乐观，但他们并不指望这能改善自己的处境。【原文：German companies operating abroad are the most upbeat in two years — but they don’t expect that to aid their own situations, according to an industry lobby survey.】

item.title: 泰国饮料公司计划在新加坡为椰子汁出口商上市
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，泰国饮料生产商通用饮料公司正计划在新加坡为一个在海外分销其品牌（包括 IF 椰子水）的部门进行首次公开募股。【原文：Thai drinks maker General Beverage Co. is planning a Singapore initial public offering for a unit that distributes its brands including IF coconut water overseas, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 壳牌和英国石油公司在 2023 年回购股票后保持稳定步伐
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）紧随壳牌公司（Shell Plc）之后，在第二季度加快了股票回购的步伐。【原文：BP Plc kept up the pace of share buybacks in the second quarter, following peer Shell Plc, as oil majors double down on making shareholders returns a priority.】

item.title: 瑞银称全球基金减持中国股票可能已经见底
item.description: 据瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）称，随着外资回流，全球基金在中国股市的低配仓位可能已经触底。【原文：Global funds’ underweight position in Chinese equities may have reached a bottom as foreign inflows return, according to UBS Group AG.】

item.title: 中国的住房计划令市场振奋但细节不多
item.description: 中国隐晦地暗示了解决房地产市场困境的计划，这让投资者感到振奋。但经济学家们希望在相信中国经济复苏之前了解更多细节。【原文：China’s cryptic hints at a plan to address its property market woes have buoyed investors. But economists want more details before buying into the recovery story.】

item.title: 英国石油公司在利润不及预期的情况下仍坚持回购股票
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）在天然气价格下跌导致第一季度利润降幅超过预期的情况下，仍保持了股票回购的步伐。【原文：BP Plc maintained the pace of its share buybacks even as first-quarter profit fell by more than expected amid lower natural gas prices.】

item.title: 摩根大通在亚洲开始新一轮投行裁员
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. has started a new round of layoffs in Asia, cutting at least seven more investment-banking jobs, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国市场现在的动向
item.description: 2024 年 1 月 3 日，星期三，英国伦敦金融城，伦敦证券交易所集团公司的标志。1984年1月3日推出的富时100指数是20世纪80年代改变伦敦金融城的众多创新之一。摄影师：Hollie Adams/Bloomberg【原文：The logo of London Stock Exchange Group Plc in the company's office atrium in the City of London, UK, on Wednesday, Jan. 3, 2024. The FTSE 100, launched on Jan. 3, 1984, was one of many innovations that transformed the City of London in the 1980s. Photographer: Hollie Adams/Bloomberg】

item.title: 沙特出现预算赤字，阿美将支付 310 亿美元股息
item.description: 尽管利润减少，阿美石油公司仍将向沙特政府和其他投资者支付 310 亿美元的红利，因为沙特经济仍在与预算赤字作斗争。【原文：Aramco will pay $31 billion in dividend to the Saudi government and other investors despite lower profit, as the kingdom’s economy continues to struggle with a budget deficit.】
